title: Freedom Under Attack | Guests: Ken Cuccinelli & Dr. Simone Gold | 7/30/20
description:
Joe Biden forgets where he is yet again and is almost ready to make his VP pick. People are fleeing Seattle in droves. Rebecca Friedrichs, founder and president of For Kids and Country, discusses how teachers’ unions are embracing Marxism and going after private schools. America’s Frontline Doctors founder Dr. Simone Gold gives the perspective on hydroxychloroquine and free speech that social media has purged. Acting DHS Deputy Secretary Ken Cuccinelli corrects the lies about federal officers pulling out of Portland. Former GOP presidential candidate Herman Cain has passed after a battle with coronavirus. Rep. Louie Gohmert joins to discuss contracting COVID-19, being bashed for not wearing a mask, and the craziness in Congress.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
